name: Fruit Attack
summary: Slicing fruits in VR environment can never be easier.  This app is different from any other fruits cutting app.   The fruits are not thrown from bottom to top.  Instead the fruit will fly to you at certain speed.  There will be bomb hidden behind.  So you will have to be careful.  Once you cut the fruits, you will get certain scores. If your score is over 500, you will proceed the next level.  Otherwise, you will have to play again on this level.   Each level it creates fruits and bomb.   In the higher...
